00381 template<typename test_container>
00382 inline void 
00383 test_base<test_container>::add_test(const std::string& name, 
00384                                     test_case the_test)
00385 {
00386     if (m_exceptionPending.length() > 0)
00387     {
00388         return;
00389     }
00390 
00391     typename std::map<std::string, std::pair<test_case, test_info> >::const_iterator it = m_tests.find(name);
00392     if (it == m_tests.end())
00393     {
00394         m_tests[name] = std::make_pair(the_test, test_info(name));
00395         m_available_tests.push_back(name);
00396     }
00397     else
00398     {
00399         std::stringstream str;
00400         str << "add_test called with test name '" << name
00401             << "' which has already been added.";
00402         m_exceptionPending = str.str();
00403     }
00404 }

00406 template<typename test_container>
00407 inline int 
00408 test_base<test_container>::run()
00409 {
00410     return run(m_available_tests);    
00411 }

00413 template<typename test_container>
00414 inline int 
00415 test_base<test_container>::run(int argc, char* argv[])
00416 {
00417     int exitStatus = EXIT_SUCCESS;
00418 
00419     if (m_exceptionPending.length() > 0)
00420     {
00421         std::cout << "ERROR in use of FRUCTOSE: " << m_exceptionPending << std::endl;
00422         exitStatus = EXIT_FAILURE;
00423     }
00424     else
00425     {
00426         test_root::suite the_suite = get_suite(argc, argv);
00427         exitStatus = run(the_suite);
00428     }
00429 
00430     return exitStatus; 
00431 }

00447 template<typename test_container>
00448 inline int 
00449 test_base<test_container>::do_run(const suite& suite) 
00450 {
00451     test_container* runner = dynamic_cast<test_container*>(this);
00452     
00453     if (runner == 0)
00454     {
00455         throw std::runtime_error(
00456             "problem in test set-up; probable cause: "
00457             "test container class not passed to test_base template");
00458     }
00459 
00460     for (typename suite::const_iterator it = suite.begin(); it != suite.end(); ++it)
00461     {
00462         std::pair<test_case, test_info> value = m_tests[it->m_test_name];
00463         test_case test_case = value.first;
00464         if (test_case)
00465         {
00466             const std::string title = "Running test case " + it->m_test_name;
00467             if (verbose())
00468             {
00469                 std::cout << std::endl << title << std::endl
00470                           << underline(title) << '\n' << std::endl;
00471             }
00472             runner->setup();
00473             runner->set_test_info(&(*it));
00474             try
00475             {
00476                 (runner->*test_case)(it->m_test_name);    
00477                 runner->teardown();
00478             }
00479             catch(std::exception& ex)
00480             {
00481                 runner->teardown();
00482                 set_exception_happened();
00483                 std::cout << ex.what() << std::endl;
00484             }
00485         }
00486         else
00487         {
00488             std::cerr << "No such test case: " << it->m_test_name << std::endl;
00489         }
00490     }
00491     
00492     return return_status();
00493 }
